verbose_text: Lab studies have reported that the use of Chlorella supplements significantly reduced the half-life of chlordecone in chlordecone poisoned rats and significantly reduced liver toxicity and cadmium accumulation in cadmium poisoned rats [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Lab studies have reported that the use of Chlorella supplements significantly reduced the half-life of chlordecone in chlordecone-poisoned rats and significantly reduced liver toxicity and cadmium
